CustomField.description: If it has been 14 days since the census call and the client hasn't completed census or if it has been 14 days since the funding call was completed but the Imp isn't completed, the Imp is "At Risk"
CustomField.formula: IF((Census_Call_Complete__c = TRUE && TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Census_Call_Date_Time__c) >= 14 && ISNULL( Census_and_Eligibility_Uploaded__c )) || (Funding_Call_Complete__c = TRUE && (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Funding_Call_Date_Time__c) >= 14 && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Implementation_Status__c, "Completed" )))), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If it has been 14 days since the census call and the client hasn't completed census or if it has been 14 days since the funding call was completed but the Imp isn't completed, the Imp is "At Risk"
CustomField.label: At Risk
